GET:
SELECT 
            s.session_id AS id, 
            s.session_user_id AS user_id, 
            substring(s.session_token from 1 for 31)||'xxxxx' AS token, 
            s.session_created AS created
        FROM 
            public.session s /*,
            (  
                SELECT u.user_is_admin AS is_admin
                FROM public.users u JOIN public.session s ON u.user_id = s.session_user_id
                WHERE s.session_token = %session_token%
                LIMIT 1
            ) su
        WHERE 
            su.is_admin = TRUE; */
